thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com | 5 of 116
thread.title: Nancy

author: Nancy
title: Nancy
text: I had carpet casters which came with the chair, but my floors were vinyl. My old casters were hard to move and made a lot of noise. The new ones are softer rubber and therefore, are much easier to move and much quieter. Nice to know you can change out casters so you get the right ones for your floors. Just make sure you measure carefully and your new casters will work great! Nancy Stallings
